articles.description:
RT kempsterrrr.eth | 🫂 🦇🔊
We're updating the @developer_dao landscape/ecosystem breakdown image...
Call for any projects/teams who feel the DAO has helped them become a reality, grow, find collaborators etc.
We'd love to add you to this! 
Here is the last one 🤩 https://t.co/ftvL6gamfE


kempsterrrr.eth | 🫂 🦇🔊: I'm creating a @developer_dao ecosystem image of projects/ideas launched in or supported by the DAO to grow. As well as partners we've worked with..
i.e. @getP3RKS @joinedenxyz @TalentLayer @coinbase @streamr 
Drop other examples below 👇

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Priyank Gupta
Published an article on incorporating @chainlink VRF with Foundry. Includes testing with a mock contract.
Could not get a local chainlink node running for a better test suite.
Maybe later one day will cover that too.

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Do you need some random numbers in your smart contracts and have some time to spare?
Check out @PriyankGupta03's developer guide to @chainlink VRF with Foundry!
https://buff.ly/3Jgje0S
